column6: "SOMEONE THEY CAN HATE," PART 3 OF 6 It's cover-to-cover blood-soaked action as the most extreme Wolverine monthly ever continues!  Wolverine has never faced an opponent quite like Contagion, who becomes a much bigger problem if he's killed!  But first, Logan must get past the aptly named Unkillables. In round two, Wolverine slashes his way past â€" and through â€" Slaughter, Suicide, Scavenger and Yi Yang, only to discover that their enigmatic leader is expecting him.  Contagion has big plans for Logan. Big plans.
